item.title: FLOWER federal learning framework studying note
item.description: My undergraduate thesis investigates an unsupervised cross-modal hashing method combined with federated learning to enable text- and image-based retrieval of heterogeneous data from multiple hospitals.

item.title: 1.3 Messages and Special Tokens
item.description: In this section we are going to talk about how LLM structure their generations through chat templates.

item.title: 1.2 What are LLMs?
item.description: This section offers a concise technical explanation of the use of LLMs.

item.title: UNIT 0
item.description: I am trying to study ai agent using the course by huggingface: Welcome to the ü§ó AI Agents Course.

item.title: 1.1 What is an Agent?
item.description: In my understanding, AI agent is a tool that can chat with human, in natural human language, and take some action like setting an alarm, reading document or creating a file, rather than just be a ‚Äútalker‚Äù.
